title: SyntaxError: cannot use `??` unparenthesized within `||` and `&&` expressions
summary: The JavaScript exception "cannot use ?? unparenthesized within || and && expressions" occurs when an nullish coalescing operator is used with a logical OR or logical AND in the same expression without parentheses.
short_title: SyntaxError: cannot use `??` unparenthesized within `||` and `&&` expressions

parents.title: SyntaxError: cannot use `??` unparenthesized within `||` and `&&` expressions
